titleStmt.title: Love in it's [sic] extasie, or, The large prerogative a kind of royall pastorall / written long since by a gentleman student at Aeton and now published.
titleStmt.author: Peaps, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for Mercy Meighen, Gabriell Bedell, and Thomas Collins and are to be sold at their shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by William Peaps. Cf. Wing.
